thread.section_title: Park South Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent staff and the hotel is beautiful
thread.title_full: Excellent staff and the hotel is beautiful - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michael W
title: Excellent staff and the hotel is beautiful
text: Beautiful newly renovated hotel. The staff were only ones compared to area hotels that were eager to help us with some very specific needs that we had. We were visiting a family member at a nearby hospital and the Park South hotel gave our stay a nice civilized touch.
